/opt/odroid-x2/compiler/bin/arm-linux-gnueabihf-g++   -std=c++11  --sysroot=/opt/odroid-x2/sdk    -Wl,--allow-shlib-undefined --sysroot=/opt/odroid-x2/sdk CMakeFiles/serial_example.dir/examples/serial_otto.cc.o  -o /root/catkin_ws/odroid-devel/lib/serial/serial_example -rdynamic /root/catkin_ws/odroid-devel/lib/libserial.so -lrt -lpthread -Wl,-rpath,/root/catkin_ws/odroid-devel/lib
